alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON, BRACKEN, CENTRAL CAMPBELL, NORTHEASTERN PENDLETON, EASTERN HAMILTON, CLERMONT, BROWN AND SOUTHERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM EDT... At 1228 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from Springdale to 7 miles southeast of Brooksville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Norwood, Forest Park, Fort Thomas, Sharonville, Blue Ash, Loveland, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Maysville, Madeira, Alexandria, Wyoming, Milford, Deer Park, Dayton, Georgetown, Blanchester and Forestville. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 5 and 20. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 8 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
